info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 6:10PM MDT until July 03 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Weber County in northern Utah... Southern Cache County in northern Utah... East central Box Elder County in northern Utah... Southwestern Rich County in northern Utah... Northeastern Davis County in northern Utah... Northern Morgan County in northern Utah... * Until 700 PM MDT * At 610 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ogden, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Brigham City, North Ogden, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Hyrum, South Weber, Perry, Willard, Marriott-Slaterville, Uintah, Mantua, Weber State University, South Willard, West Haven, Pleasant View, Farr West, Harrisville and Plain City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 345 and 363. Interstate 84 between mile markers 87 and 100. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
